domain_prefix_override.description: The domain prefix you want to override for your facets subdomain. eg: `<your-override-value>.console.facets.cloud`

acm.description: The ARN of the ACM certificate created for that domain

connection_idle_timeout.description: The load balancer has a configured idle timeout period (in seconds) that applies to its connections. If no data has been sent or received by the time that the idle timeout period elapses, the load balancer closes the connection

renew_cert_before.description: configures number of hours before cert manager renews a certificate. Default value is 720hrs (30 days). Entered duration must be parseable by go's time.ParseDuration method. see https://pkg.go.dev/time#ParseDuration
